title.full: Bioerosion バイオエロージョン
title.reduced: Bioerosion バイオエロージョン

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Play Bioerosion (TPS : Third Person Shooter) and shoot down the approaching monsters!　The city takes on different appearances as you advance through the stages.... Copyright 2011 MUKAGOSOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
